channel.title: Diff glow with playerrights?
channel.description: there was a tut in the tut section...but i cant find it anymore... any1 knows about some that puts an glowing animation on a mod/admin/owner? sumtin like && playerrights =1) a red glow or something, and =2) blue? any1 can help me with that or post the link to that tutorial? thx :P
